member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY
member.summary: Specifies the indices of the system sub-properties that may be present in any property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_DISPLAYNAME
member.summary: The name for the parent property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_ISREADONLY
member.summary: A Boolean indicating whether the parent property is writable.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_MIN
member.summary: The minimum value that can be set to the parent property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_MAX
member.summary: The maximum value that can be set to the parent property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_DEFAULT
member.summary: The default value of the parent property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_FIELDS
member.summary: An array of name/index pairs that indicate the possible values that can be set to the parent property.

member.name: D2D1_SUBPROPERTY.D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_INDEX
member.summary: An index sub-property used by the elements of the D2D1_SUBPROPERTY_FIELDS array.
